Description: Red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior perhaps formerly covered with a cream-coloured slip and with the remains of one line of cord-marked decoration, with remains of ten lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior and a further four lines on the interior.
Bibliographic references: Kaplony-Heckel 1963a / Die demotischen Tempeleide I: Text (p.76-8)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963b / Die demotischen Tempeleide II: Abbildungen (p.29)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (50443) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/50443)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
